availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County farmer. Kentucky native. Married Frances Woolery. Father of Joseph Woolery, Robert Woolery, James Woolery, and Mary Woolery.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 112. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 57. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Richland District, p. 23. “John Woolery,” Find A Grave, October 1, 2009, memorial no. 42606102.
